attributes.action: CREATE JOBS AND TRAINING COURSES FOR PEOPLE OVER 25.
attributes.additional_details:
under 25.s have just been given millions of pounds worth of work based training when over 25 are left with nothing....
david cameron said that this country was let down by labour yet he refuses to help the ones most affected.... OVER 25.
under 25s get help and training from schools and collleges but overs are struggling as they have been out of work for years and did not recieve any training or help the government is quick to judge labour but isnt helping the ones affected. OVER 25S NEED SKILL BUILDERS AND WORK-BASED TRAINING
